Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.Error

  • Packages that use NavigationManager.Error 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance
    This package includes classes, interfaces, and enumerations related to guidance and turn-by-turn navigation, used by other packages in the APIs for Android SDK.

    • Uses of NavigationManager.Error in com.here.android.mpa.guidance

      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.guidance that return NavigationManager.Error 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NavigationManager.Error NavigationManager.resume()
      Resume paused Navigation.
      NavigationManager.Error NavigationManager.setDistanceUnit(NavigationManager.UnitSystem us)
      Sets the measuring unit system that is used by voice guidance.
      NavigationManager.Error NavigationManager.setMapUpdateMode(NavigationManager.MapUpdateMode mode)
      Sets the Map Update Mode, different modes changes the way position is updated.
      NavigationManager.Error NavigationManager.setRoute(Route route)
      Sets the route navigation manager should use.
      NavigationManager.Error NavigationManager.setRouteRequestInterval(int value)
      Set the time period between two re-routing.
      NavigationManager.Error NavigationManager.setSpeedWarningOptions(float lowSpeedOffset, float highSpeedOffset, float highSpeedBoundary)
      Set speed warning options.
      NavigationManager.Error NavigationManager.setTrafficAvoidanceMode(NavigationManager.TrafficAvoidanceMode mode)
      Set the way in which traffic should be handled during navigation.
      NavigationManager.Error VoiceGuidanceOptions.setVoiceSkin(VoiceSkin skin)
      Sets the voice skin id for voice Navigation.
      NavigationManager.Error NavigationManager.simulate(Route route, long speed)
      Start route simulation.
      NavigationManager.Error NavigationManager.startNavigation(Route route)
      Start navigation along the route.
      NavigationManager.Error NavigationManager.startTracking()
      Start tracking mode.
      static NavigationManager.Error NavigationManager.Error.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static NavigationManager.Error[] NavigationManager.Error.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      NavigationManager.Error NavigationManager.RoadView.zoomIn()
      Zooms in the map.
      NavigationManager.Error NavigationManager.RoadView.zoomOut()
      Zooms out the map.
